about.title: About us
about.subtitle: Our service allows people to exchange books.
about.description: The owner of a book can give it to the service to offer it for rent to those interested.

personal.title: Personal account
personal.subtitle: In your personal account, you can see information about your personal books, books in your possession, reserved books, favorites, as well as your rental history in general.
personal.description: There you will also find other details that interest you.

catalog.title: Catalog
catalog.subtitle: Flexible search with filters and suitable sorting.
catalog.description: Adapted to your financial expectations and rental period.

meetUp.title: Book Meetup #4
meetUp.subtitle: Yellow Place Company (Lviv Coffee House)
meetUp.description: There you can pick up your latest ordered books!

hero.text: Our service allows people to exchange books. The owner of a book can give it to the service to offer it for rent to those interested.
hero.text2: The book can be given away permanently or temporarily. Those interested can use the book for a chosen period and pay less for it than the book costs in the store.

benefits.title: Books - New Assets
benefits.text1: On the other hand, book-sharing allows you to avoid spending a lot of money to explore books you're interested in.
benefits.text2: will help you get the books you need, for just the right amount of time and without overpaying!

features.title: Features
features.text2: - Database of all books available to the service

socials.title: Finding Like-Minded People
socials.text: Paper books are being reimagined. They are no longer just a source of knowledge but also a foundation for community: from finding like-minded individuals to sharing experiences.
socials.text2: Professional communities and groups of friends are built around the same books.

demoAlert.text: This is only a demo version of the service client. No real transactions or operations are being conducted!

wallet.title: Wallet Deposit
wallet.text: **The payment will be processed on an external service that complies with PCI DSS security standards.**

placeholders.notAvailable: So far, this function is not available
placeholders.notFound: Nothing found - try an advanced search.

modal.title: Are you sure you want to remove the book from the order?

timezone.couldBeRent: Place your order within two days to keep your spot in the queue.

cart.title: Cart
cart.subtitle: Order contents
cart.commTitle: Take a closer look as well
cart.commDescr: A selection of recommended books based on your order

checkout.title: Order processing
checkout.subtitle: Payment
checkout.description: Funds will be deducted from your internal wallet
checkout.deliveryDescription: Specify and verify the delivery method and address.
checkout.nearestMeetUp: Pick up at the nearest meetup in a coffee shop

result.text: The order has been successfully paid and completed!
result.description: Please wait for delivery within the timeframe specified in your order.

book.author: Author
book.deliveryByCourier: Delivery by courier service within 2 days.
book.tooltip: The price is very volatile, so it may change at any time.

reservable.title: You can reserve
reservable.subtitle: At the moment, all copies of this book are taken.
reservable.description: You can place a reservation on it to rent it once it becomes available and your turn comes.

outOfStock.title: Out of stock
outOfStock.subtitle: At the moment, there are no copies of this book from users in the service.
outOfStock.description: You can place a reservation on it to rent it once it becomes available and your turn comes, or add it to your favorites.
